website_summaries.verdict: Though it's a bit basic compared to other models, it is safe and affordable. The best pick if your budget is slim.
pros: A reliable seat by a trusted name in baby products
Offers reasonably lightweight yet study construction and an easy-to-grip padded handle
cons: Though rated for babies up to 35 lbs., some parents complain that the fit is a bit snug

customer_reviews.title: I love this car seat
customer_reviews.text: I love this car seat. It stood out to me because it looks different from other seats and I read other reviews saying it was super padded and that sounded like it would be safer for my daughter. She fits in it perfectly. My husband however doesn't like it because it doesn't go in shopping carts like other seats. It won't hook to the seat part. We have to put it sideways in the part where you put your groceries and things. Other then that I haven't had any problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color, love the size
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color, love the size. My baby was premie so the first weeks i put her inside rolled her in a blanket and put her inside the car seat until she is 10pounds . It works for me... Love the material also
customer_reviews.author: DDDLC

customer_reviews.title: Chic color, great buy for this mother of four!
customer_reviews.text: As a mother of four, I've gone through well over ten car seats so far. I bought this to bring my newborn home in and it was wonderful. Great head support, cute color, super safe base and seat!
customer_reviews.author: Manager of Mayhem

customer_reviews.title: Trustworthy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this car seat for my new granddaughter. It was very easy to figure out. I installed the seat myself and it didn't take me 5 minutes. It is very well made and I'm very pleased with it. I trust this car seat to help protect my granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Key

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I love how lightweight it is and also that it scored well on the impact tests. Baby seems as comfortable as you would expect in a seat like this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Great so far, glad it has a headrest. The model we bought 3 years ago didn't. Shade on this one seems to be functional as well.
customer_reviews.author: ShoppingCritic

customer_reviews.title: Nice car seat.
customer_reviews.text: Nice car seat, base is nice, fits in car nicely and can tighten good. My sun shade on the car seat came broken on the side. It still works but have to pull that one side up differently. Doesn't effect the car seat itself in any way so no Biggie. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Good at the price point
customer_reviews.text: Id say this is a okay chair in a pinch. The handle used to carry the chair stops at an awkward angle making it harder to carry. There isn't a ton of padding but the head pillow is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: India Tracey

customer_reviews.title: disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: seat width too narrow, even for average sized babies. Base too long, don't buy if you have a small car or your knees will be to your chest while driving. Seats locking mechanism seems cheap, just plastic pegs. Seat will not lock into any stroller or shopping cart.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Well-Rounded Seat
customer_reviews.text: Very cushioned, easy to install, and easy to get in and out of the vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this car seat for my daughter for over a year now and have no complaints. From bringing her home from the hospital to now and she’s almost 2 years old. It’s a great car seat for a great price
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this car seat! It is so comfortable for my little wine and it is so light weight. I am a very small girl and I do Siri easy for me to carry my little one around in this. And I love the design and colors because it’s not super gawty
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get in and out of the car
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this blindly for our first baby not knowing what to get and it's been great. The car seat base is wonderful, it's easy to get the cars eat in and out of the car with minimal fuss. We purchased a 2nd car seat base for my partner's car that fits the seat which makes it easy for both of us.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Infant Car Seat
customer_reviews.text: We used this car seat with our daughter from the time she was born until right before she turned 2. It isn't super super lightweight but it was never overly difficult to lift and carry her in it. I loved the car seat and it worked perfectly until she grew to big to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Discomfort
customer_reviews.text: It is a little bit heave for me and I don’t feel it is comfortable for baby back . Not recommended
customer_reviews.author: Ace_mom

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper version
customer_reviews.text: Okay for the money. Definitely a “cheaper” version of my Chicco. We needed a spare car seat and this does the job. Would not be my pick for the main car seat. Feels cheap in comparison to the Chicco.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Kinser

customer_reviews.title: Very cushioned and light!
customer_reviews.text: Received two days early which is great. Car seat is just as cushioned as it looks!! Will be putting an infant insert in for extra comfort and safety. Very happy with what I received.
customer_reviews.author: Tropicalmango

customer_reviews.title: Love it!  Cute colors, exactly as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy set up, and solid but comfy materials. Highly recommend! With any car seat, I highly suggest getting the safety belt covers, since the straps can be uncomfortable for little ones. But that's every car seat. Would definitely purchase again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Great for babies who are 3lbs
customer_reviews.text: This carseat is good for premature babies. In the description it states 4lbs for babies but the doctors provided information that it’s goes as low as 3lbs. Great carseat!
customer_reviews.author: Louis Igwe

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had several car seats but this was my favorite one. It provided a lot of cushion for my baby from newborn until 1 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Evenflo Carseat
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what you see. High quality, heavy material, base for easy in and out with car rides. I do suggest you get a head support if using for newborn.
customer_reviews.author: crystal seybert

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect seat! Passed on to a boy, just ordered a blue canopy from the manufacturer!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Extremely hard to remove the cover, and the plastic is cheap
customer_reviews.text: It has a relatively cheap price, so I guess I got what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: Very affordable cute car seat, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Love this car seat and the color are so pretty
customer_reviews.author: Nina Rethage

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this carseat. My 5th and only daughter uses it.
customer_reviews.author: Kaysee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Came in perfect condition still in the box and bag within! So pretty and cushioned!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Miller

customer_reviews.title: Easy instal for ftm
customer_reviews.text: We hated my daughters first car seat, it made us so nervous so we purchased this one and it works great and was really easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Airiana Herne

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: It was for my grand daughter and it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Cummings III

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Just received it today. Very soft and cushiony. Pink looks a little darker then what it looks like in pic but still very pretty. Everything seems fine, will update if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Edwards

customer_reviews.title: love how you just sit it into the base in ...
customer_reviews.text: love how you just sit it into the base in the car and off you go, also love the shade from rain and Florida sun
customer_reviews.author: Claudio Veras

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for the 7 first months, after that you need a bigger one
customer_reviews.author: yazmin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect car seat
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my 2 month old. It’s very soft and comfortable, I love it. Easy to install as well, and fits in my SUV with two toddler car seats on each side.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Great seat for under 100$
customer_reviews.text: These seats were great for my twins. They fit small babies well with built in head support. The bases have a well seen level to make sure the seat is at the right angle in the car. I feel they would be safe in these seat. Straps are easy to adjust as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tessie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It’s so light weight , which is nice when lugging it around!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Baker

customer_reviews.title: lightweight but could use some redesigning
customer_reviews.text: i really do like this car seat and appreciate how light it is because i myself am a small person. but holy cow they need to figure out how to put some padding on the side paneling because both my legs have bruises all over them from the sides stabbing into them. that’s my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine k.

customer_reviews.title: Great Car Seat
customer_reviews.text: I love this car seat, it is so easy to take apart and clean. My granddaughter fits in it well. It's easy to put in and out with the base it makes it easier.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Reid

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only place my daughter will sleep. LOVE this car seat!! Very comfortable and easy to put her in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight so it's easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight so it's easy to carry, I love it and my daughter seems to love it too.
customer_reviews.author: Nira C

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Ordered a second base through the company for the second car. Easy to change the straps.
customer_reviews.author: Kass

customer_reviews.title: It’s alright for temporary
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty heavy in my opinion. I have a Jeep and I still had to move my seat forward to put this car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Jennira

customer_reviews.title: She Loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this car seat def not for a small car though. Seems a lot longer n bulky then other car seats. But thats why i love it i feel like she feels safe in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this product it is light weight easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product it is light weight easy to carry. Came on time and in great condition cannot wait to try it out!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Everything I needed
customer_reviews.text: It is what I expected. Easy to carry, install and put the baby in.
customer_reviews.author: kisha hoyt

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great car seat for a newborn. The cushioning for the head is perfect. Some of the other car seats newborns are swimming in, this one is just the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin K

customer_reviews.title: Mkay
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a cheaper handle on it, maybe in just paranoid. Everything else is wonderful; material, sturdiness, looks. It has it all
customer_reviews.author: Christian The Magnificent

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely wonderful!!
customer_reviews.text: These car seats are absolutely wonderful, could not be happier with the ease of putting them in and out of the car. Very light weight.
customer_reviews.author: sharon heskett

customer_reviews.title: Super Light Weight
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! Super easy to install and not to heavy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia T.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this seat! It’s narrow so it fits easy in the back seat with 2 other car seats but big enough to keep her safe. Very easy install and worth every penny! Plus it looks way comfy in person!
customer_reviews.author: Kmarie131719

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: IT IS VERY LIGHT, COMES ASSEMBLED AND THE COLORS ARE VERY BRIGHT!! ABSOLUTELY RECOMMEND PURCHASING THIS CARSEAT.
customer_reviews.author: JANICE

customer_reviews.title: I like it so far
customer_reviews.text: I like it so far. Baby is due in July so I haven't gotten to use it yet. So far so good though.
customer_reviews.author: Becki

customer_reviews.title: Love ❤️
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this car seat 💺 it is surprisingly lightweight and easy to carry your little one around... I would recommend this car seat to any new parent looking for something with a good price but with a high quality
customer_reviews.author: AllyMcbeal

customer_reviews.title: Weight most important and it’s perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this car seat! My main goal was weight and this is a light car seat
customer_reviews.author: Chad Archibald

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this carrier! It’s light weight, easy to install and seems comfortable for our daughter!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Dunn

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Really loved how easy it was to install and the adjustment straps worked with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Safety & comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Works great , has great features , soft , really comfortable , safe , great color . My daughter loves it .
customer_reviews.author: Breanna Teague

customer_reviews.title: Loved the lightness of carseat and the quality was great ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved the lightness of carseat and the quality was great to! Bought a different insert for my newborn to keep her more secure but still love this carseat. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Miller

customer_reviews.title: Light weight!
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this car seat! It is so light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I loved how soft and comfy the seat was and how light it was! Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits in small space
customer_reviews.text: Fits great in the middle seat between two big booster seats in our escape
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth Ignont

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Car seat is super cute, simple and was delivered very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Perez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this car seat! By far best infant car seat I've found yet!
customer_reviews.author: tabby

customer_reviews.title: Love this car seat!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this car seat! I was worried there wouldn't be enough padding in it but to my surprise it was very padded! I love the colors and the look of this car seat. Our baby will be preemie so we looked for one that she could fit in ASAP this car seat fits from 4lbs! The car seat releases from the base extremely easy but feels like it will provide great protection. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hendon

customer_reviews.title: but otherwise it is great!
customer_reviews.text: Wish it connected to cart, but otherwise it is great!
customer_reviews.author: Eliz

customer_reviews.title: I would pay for something better. You get what you pay for with this
customer_reviews.text: The clasps are very cheap to me. I would pay for something better. You get what you pay for with this
customer_reviews.author: Shaula Swindell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Can't wait for my baby girl to get here!

product_meta.title: Evenflo LiteMax 35 Infant Car Seat, Easy to Install, Versatile & Convenient, Meets or Exceeds All Federal Safety Standards, Machine-Washable Pads, Full-Coverage Canopy, Azalea Pink
product_meta.description: Color:Azalea PinkEvenflo continues to redefine industry standards with ROLLOVER TESTED car seats. The LiteMax™ 35 Infant Car Seat is the easiest car seat to carry. It is designed with your lifestyle in mind. It's extremely lightweight carrier and ergo handle, is uniquely designed for your maximum comfort as you carry your little one. The LiteMax 35 also comes with an easy to install base equipped with a two step vehicle belt lock-off for a quick and secure installation. LiteMax 35 also provides 4 recline options to optimize your child's comfort on those long car rides.
feature_bullets: EVENFLO LIGHTWEIGHT CAR SEAT: The Evenflo LiteMax 35 Infant Car Seat is an easy-to-install and professionally designed lightweight infant car seat. It has been engineered and tested to meet or exceed two-times federal safety standards.

EASY TO INSTALL: The Evenflo LiteMax 35 Infant Car Seat has been designed with an easy-to-install base with a one-step vehicle belt lock-off that produces a secure and quick installation. The Base also offers 4 reclining options to optimize comfort.
PARENT-FRIENDLY FEATURES: This infant seat includes removable head and body pillows for improved comfort, machine-washable pads, and more.

VERSATILE & CONVENIENT: Our Evenflo LiteMax 35 Infant Car Seat includes a stay-in-car convenience base that minimizes overall parent effort. This rear-facing infant car seat fits babies from 4 to 35 pounds and 17 to 32-inch tall.

TRUSTED FOR NEARLY 100 YEARS: Evenflo has been a trusted source of quality-built child-safety systems for almost 100 years. The real-life design that goes into each of our products has been engineered for everyday use.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars313 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
